File_Description: Data package level readme. Contains data package summary; acknowledgements; and contact information.
File-level metadata that lists and describes all of the files contained in the data package.
Standard: ESS-DIVE Reporting Format for Comma-separated Values (CSV) File Structure (Velliquette et al. 2021); ESS-DIVE Reporting Format for File-level Metadata (Velliquette et al. 2021)

File_Description: Data dictionary that defines columns headers across all csv files contained in the data package.
Standard: ESS-DIVE Reporting Format for Comma-separated Values (CSV) File Structure (Velliquette et al. 2021).

File_Description: R Studio Project file that sets the relative directory for all R scripts that begin with "r*_" where the asterisk indicates a digit 1 through 6 (e.g. "r1_").
Table of input and output values for Damkohler number analysis. The instances of "e" mentioned within numeric columns refer to scientific notation.
Standard: ESS-DIVE Reporting Format for Comma-separated Values (CSV) File Structure (Velliquette et al. 2021).

File_Description: Sample metadata including sample name information for each vial used during the campaign and accompanying information captured in the field (i.e. coordinates; date; stream name). The information in this file came from the Worldwide Hydrobiogeochemistry Observation Network for Dynamic River Systems (WHONDRS) Yakima River Basin (YRB) data package; this is an edited copy of the Sample Field Metadata originally published in that data package.
Standard: ESS-DIVE Reporting Format for Comma-separated Values (CSV) File Structure (Velliquette et al. 2021).

File_Description: Summary file with the number of molecular formulas associated with Van Krevelen compound classes.
Standard: ESS-DIVE Reporting Format for Comma-separated Values (CSV) File Structure (Velliquette et al. 2021).

File_Description: Summary file with the number of molecular formulas associated with each elemental composition.
Standard: ESS-DIVE Reporting Format for Comma-separated Values (CSV) File Structure (Velliquette et al. 2021).

File_Description: Summary file with mean; median; and standard deviation metrics for each of the numerical properties found in the Mol file.
Standard: ESS-DIVE Reporting Format for Comma-separated Values (CSV) File Structure (Velliquette et al. 2021).

File_Description: Processed Fourier-transform ion cyclotron resonance mass spectrometry (FTICR-MS) mass-by-sample data. The first column contains peak masses. The following columns are samples. Each row is a peak intensity with values higher than zero indicating the peak is present in that sample. Poorly calibrated samples were removed from the dataset and sample replicates from each site were merged such that a peak was kept in the merged sample if it was present in at least one of the reps.
Standard: ESS-DIVE Reporting Format for Comma-separated Values (CSV) File Structure (Velliquette et al. 2021).

File_Description: Processed Fourier-transform ion cyclotron resonance mass spectrometry (FTICR-MS) data containing molecular information describing each mass value in "Processed_WROL_RC2_Mol_Clean_083023.csv".
Standard: ESS-DIVE Reporting Format for Comma-separated Values (CSV) File Structure (Velliquette et al. 2021).

File_Description: Total number of transformations for each sample and normalized transformations. Normalized transformations are the total number of transformations divided by the number of peaks in the sample.
Standard: ESS-DIVE Reporting Format for Comma-separated Values (CSV) File Structure (Velliquette et al. 2021).

File_Description: Mean dissolved organic carbon (DOC; reported as non-purgeable organic carbon; NPOC); total nitrogen (TN);  dissolved inorganic carbon (DIC); total suspended solids (TSS); and ions from water samples. For each sampling event (e.g. RC2_0005); the  values of each of the three biological replicates for a given measurement (e.g. RC2_0005-1; RC2_0005-2; RC2_0005-3) are averaged. Any replicate values that were an outlier (using distance-based outlier detection) or above/below the limit of detection are not included in the mean. The "Mean_Missing_Reps" column indicates if a mean does not include all three replicates using a TRUE/FALSE flag where TRUE indicates one or more replicates are missing from the mean. Some sample types were not collected with replicates (i.e. TSS).
Standard: ESS-DIVE Reporting Format for Comma-separated Values (CSV) File Structure (Velliquette et al. 2021).

File_Description: Table of season labels for each sample for the Yakima River basin samples.
Standard: ESS-DIVE Reporting Format for Comma-separated Values (CSV) File Structure (Velliquette et al. 2021).

File_Description: Table of water chemistry for the Watershed Rules of Life (WROL) project samples.
Standard: ESS-DIVE Reporting Format for Comma-separated Values (CSV) File Structure (Velliquette et al. 2021).

File_Description: Table of geospatial information for all sample sites. The information in this file was created using the workflow found at https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.8140272. The instances of "e" mentioned within numeric columns refer to scientific notation.
Standard: ESS-DIVE Reporting Format for Comma-separated Values (CSV) File Structure (Velliquette et al. 2021).

File_Description: Table of geospatial information for additional sites. The information in this file was created from NHDPlus HR (National Hydrography Dataset High Resolution) dataset.
Standard: ESS-DIVE Reporting Format for Comma-separated Values (CSV) File Structure (Velliquette et al. 2021).

File_Description: Information and metadata associated with sites including latitude and longitude coordinates and the NHDPlus (National Hydrography Dataset Version 2) common identifier (COMID). The COMID can be used to extract geospatial variables from various sources.
Standard: ESS-DIVE Reporting Format for Comma-separated Values (CSV) File Structure (Velliquette et al. 2021).

File_Description: Table of surface water residence times for all samples.
Standard: ESS-DIVE Reporting Format for Comma-separated Values (CSV) File Structure (Velliquette et al. 2021).

File_Description: Water chemistry data (pH; specific conductance; total dissolved solids; and temperature) and statistics (e.g. mean; range; and outlier) collected using an Ultrameter II 6PFCE with handheld sensor.
Standard: ESS-DIVE Reporting Format for Comma-separated Values (CSV) File Structure (Velliquette et al. 2021).

File_Description: Table of water temperature for each sample for the Watershed Rules of Life (WROL) project samples.
Standard: ESS-DIVE Reporting Format for Comma-separated Values (CSV) File Structure (Velliquette et al. 2021).

File_Description: R data file containing a list of compiled input data frames.
R data file of all study data in wide format.
Table of all study data in wide format. The instances of "e" mentioned within numeric columns refer to scientific notation.
Standard: ESS-DIVE Reporting Format for Comma-separated Values (CSV) File Structure (Velliquette et al. 2021).

Table of metadata for each sample.

File_Description: R data file of geospatial indices for each sample site. The instances of "e" mentioned within numeric columns refer to scientific notation.
Filtered table of geospatial indices for each sample site. The instances of "e" mentioned within numeric columns refer to scientific notation.
Standard: ESS-DIVE Reporting Format for Comma-separated Values (CSV) File Structure (Velliquette et al. 2021).
